page.title: 07The Tweddles Typical Sunday
page.content: We have a chalet at{Haggerston Castle Caravan Park in Northumberland about 50 miles north of{Dinnington.}We went to Haggerston for the weekend and on Sunday we spent the morning at{ {Bamburgh}a village with a fine castle, long ago it was the ancient capital of Northumbria.We saw the B.B.C. with their outside T.V. Unit preparing for the programme, "Bird Watch"to be televised from the bird sanctuary on the nearby Farne Islands. We walked along the coastal path and we bought an ice cream costing 23p and a can of lemonade costing 30p. We returned to the chalet and after lunch I went sailing on the lake in my dinghy. We left{Haggerston}at tea time to return to{Dinnington,}dad and I took our dog Maxi for a walk. {
